Profile Summary:

Voya Financial in Windsor, CT is looking to hire a Data Scientist to work in the Analytics Center of Excellence. The Data Scientist will be responsible for expanding the use of big data technologies in the COE.

Profile Description:
  • Supporting and enhancing partnerships with business stakeholders and subject matter experts
  • Identifying opportunities to expand the business impact from data analytics through the use of big data
  • Evaluating and recommending big data platforms and technologies
  • Identifying and assessing the value of big data sources
  • Performing data analytics and predictive modeling using big data sources in combination with traditional structured data sources
  • Working with the COE's Data Team to integrate big data sources with traditional in-house and 3rd-party data
Knowledge and Experience:

Our ideal candidate will have strong academic qualifications in a quantitative discipline and hands-on experience answering key business questions using big data analytics.

Required:
  • Advanced degree or equivalent work experience in a quantitative discipline such as statistics, computer science, actuarial, applied mathematics, or engineering
  • In-depth knowledge and experience selecting and applying appropriate data analytics algorithms such as decision trees, regression methods, stochastic models, neural networks, and time series analyses
  • Expertise in SQL query development, Hadoop, Python, and data visualization
  • Experience with Big Data Analytics tools required; Experience with Cloudera Data Science Workbench preferred.
  • Solid business acumen with the ability to quickly learn about Voya's core businesses (Retirement, Annuity, Insurance, Employee Benefits, Investment Management)
  • 2 - 4 Years of experience in related field
  • Knowledge of IBM SPSS Modeler a plus.
